Package com.twcable.grabbit.tools.monitor.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MonitoringEvent
    An event generated by PollingJobMonitor.monitor() as it polls Grabbit services.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompletedJobsMonitoringEvent
    A MonitoringEvent that contains any jobs that have completed since the last poll.
    EndMonitoringEvent
    A MonitoringEvent that marks all of the jobs no longer running.
    FailedJobsMonitoringEvent
    A MonitoringEvent that contains any jobs that have failed since the last poll.
    JobStatusMonitoringEvent
    The current status of a job, complete with detail.
    PollingMonitoringEvent
    An event indicating the start of a polling request to the Grabbit client.
    SleepMonitoringEvent
    An event indicating that the poller is about to sleep.
    StartMonitoringEvent
    An event indicating that polling operations are about to begin.
